fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: drawerCallback
fields.desc: Optional callback that is called when a [Drawer] is opened or closed.

fields.name: dragStartBehavior
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.DrawerController.dragStartBehavior} Determines the way that drag start behavior is handled.

fields.name: scrimColor
fields.desc: The color to use for the scrim that obscures the underlying content while a drawer is open.

fields.name: enableOpenDragGesture
fields.desc: Determines if the [Drawer] can be opened with a drag gesture.

fields.name: edgeDragWidth
fields.desc: The width of the area within which a horizontal swipe will open the drawer.

fields.name: isDrawerOpen
fields.desc: Whether or not the drawer is opened or closed.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of DrawerController
desc: 【enableOpenDragGesture】: Whether to slide open from the side 【bool】
